name: Breaking Bad
synopsis: Badger's arrest forces Walt and Jesse into league with a shady lawyer.

episodes.title: Seven Thirty-Seven
episodes.synopsis: As they lay plans for their final big drug deals, Walt and Jesse worry that their sole buyer will think nothing of killing them when it suits him.

episodes.title: Grilled
episodes.synopsis: As a DEA manhunt for Tuco gets under way, Skyler enlists Hank in the search for Walt.

episodes.title: Bit by a Dead Bee
episodes.synopsis: As Hank comes dangerously close to uncovering Walt's role in the drug trade, he devises a plan to cover his tracks.

episodes.title: Down
episodes.synopsis: With Walt struggling to bridge the growing gulf between him and Skyler, Jesse finds himself without a home after his parents evict him.

episodes.title: Breakage
episodes.synopsis: Hank tries to pull himself together after his encounter with Tuco. Meanwhile, Jesse assembles a crew to get more product on the street.

episodes.title: Peekaboo
episodes.synopsis: As Jesse pursues the addicts who stole Skinny Pete's drug supply, Walt devises a cover story to explain how he's been paying for his treatments.

episodes.title: Negro y Azul
episodes.synopsis: As Jesse's reputation as a drug lord leads Walt to push for expansion of the operation, Hank's foray into the DEA's El Paso office leaves him shaken.

episodes.title: Better Call Saul
episodes.synopsis: Badger's arrest forces Walt and Jesse into league with a shady lawyer.

episodes.title: 4 Days Out
episodes.synopsis: Worried that he doesn't have much longer to live, Walt looks to provide for his family by enlisting Jesse for a marathon meth-cooking session.

episodes.title: Over
episodes.synopsis: In the wake of good news about his cancer treatments, Walt turns on his brother-in-law before focusing his attention on making things right at home.

name: The Blacklist
synopsis: A criminal mastermind surrenders to the FBI with a stunning offer to catch an elusive terrorist -- but he'll only talk to a specific rookie profiler.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.synopsis: A criminal mastermind surrenders to the FBI with a stunning offer to catch an elusive terrorist -- but he'll only talk to a specific rookie profiler.

episodes.title: The Freelancer (No. 145)
episodes.synopsis: Liz and Red track an assassin who disguises his kills in large-scale catastrophes. The Department of Justice struggles to understand Red's motives.

episodes.title: Wujing (No. 84)
episodes.synopsis: Liz and Red go undercover to take down an assassin who's been decimating the ranks of the CIA. Tom asks Liz about the man who attacked him.

episodes.title: The Stewmaker (No. 161)
episodes.synopsis: When Liz's key witness disappears, Red suspects a killer who literally stews his victims, making them vanish without a trace.

episodes.title: The Courier (No. 85)
episodes.synopsis: A sinister middleman with a unique ability puts the FBI on the trail of a missing NSA analyst.

episodes.title: Gina Zanetakos (No. 152)
episodes.synopsis: Eager to clear Tom's name, Liz turns him in to the FBI -- but she soon discovers that he's involved with a corporate terrorist.

episodes.title: Frederick Barnes (No. 47)
episodes.synopsis: Following a chemical attack on the subway, Liz and the team hunt down a mad scientist who used to work for the government.

episodes.title: General Ludd (No. 109)
episodes.synopsis: Red is enlisted to help Liz and the FBI go after an anti-capitalist cabal that's intent on bringing the U.S. economy to its knees.

episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (No. 16): Part 1
episodes.synopsis: An assassination attempt on Red brings the FBI under siege. Liz stealthily moves through the building to retake the facility.

episodes.title: Anslo Garrick (No. 16): Part 2
episodes.synopsis: Liz and a mysterious stranger fight to save Red and Ressler from Anslo Garrick and his Wild Bunch gang.

name: The Alienist
synopsis: When a boy's mutilated body is found on a bridge, alienist Dr. Kreizler notices similarities to an unsolved murder involving a former patient of his.

episodes.title: The Boy on the Bridge
episodes.synopsis: When a boy's mutilated body is found on a bridge, alienist Dr. Kreizler notices similarities to an unsolved murder involving a former patient of his.

episodes.title: A Fruitful Partnership
episodes.synopsis: Giorgio's brother shares with Sara a revealing comment the police made to his family. Kreizler calls a team meeting. John investigates at the brothel.

episodes.title: Silver Smile
episodes.synopsis: Sally helps Kreizler better understand the victims' relationship to the killer. When another body is found, Sara notices its location fits a pattern.

episodes.title: These Bloody Thoughts
episodes.synopsis: Kreizler visits a former patient to get inside a sadist's mind. John develops a theory about the silver smile. Mrs. Santorelli gets a horrific letter.

episodes.title: Hildebrandt’s Starling
episodes.synopsis: A detail in the letter leads Kreizler to the date of the next murder. Roosevelt learns of Willem Van Bergen and takes matters into his own hands.

episodes.title: Ascension
episodes.synopsis: Hoping to lure the killer, the team uses Stevie as bait. Sara catches Kreizler in a strange lie and confronts him. Connor learns Willem is on the run.

episodes.title: Many Sainted Men
episodes.synopsis: Mutilations on the latest body suggest the killer may be linked to the Old West. Kreizler is forced to rethink how he treats those in his household.

episodes.title: Psychopathia Sexualis
episodes.synopsis: At St. Elizabeths, Kreizler and John learn of a soldier fitting their profile. Hearing their news, Sara visits the suspect's hometown in upstate N.Y.

episodes.title: Requiem
episodes.synopsis: As Cyrus plans to get revenge against Connor, Sara takes the team to the Census Bureau, where they get a lead on their suspect's whereabouts.

episodes.title: Castle in the Sky
episodes.synopsis: When Joseph goes missing, John fears the worst and pours his heart out to Sara. Kreizler and Sara share past traumas. Kreizler confronts the killer.

name: Manifest
synopsis: When a plane mysteriously lands years after takeoff, the people onboard return to a world that has moved on without them and face strange new realities.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.synopsis: Flight 828 arrives in New York with passengers who are unaware they’ve been missing for years as a mysterious phenomenon influences their behavior.

episodes.title: Reentry
episodes.synopsis: The NSA interrogates the people on Flight 828 as they try to resume their lives. One passenger falls victim to a crime after speaking to the media.

episodes.title: Turbulence
episodes.synopsis: Michaela visits Evie’s parents, who struggle with their loss. Twin siblings Cal and Olive try to reconnect after five and a half years apart.

episodes.title: Unclaimed Baggage
episodes.synopsis: Michaela misinterprets her latest vision, landing her ex-fiancé Jared in trouble. Ben and Saanvi seek out a flight attendant from Flight 828.

episodes.title: Connecting Flights
episodes.synopsis: Flashbacks reveal how loved ones coped after Flight 828's disappearance. To escape the voice in his head, Ben goes on an adventure with Cal.

episodes.title: Off Radar
episodes.synopsis: When Cal develops a fever and begins speaking another language, Ben sets out to find a cure by searching for another passenger from the plane.

episodes.title: S.N.A.F.U.
episodes.synopsis: Ben investigates the whereabouts of 11 missing passengers from Flight 828. After her latest Calling, Michaela makes a shocking discovery.

episodes.title: Point of No Return
episodes.synopsis: Ben finds an unlikely partner in NSA Director Vance while locating the missing passengers. Michaela has a strange Calling and Cal goes back to school.

episodes.title: Dead Reckoning
episodes.synopsis: As Ben and Michaela race to save the other missing passengers, their risky rescue mission takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Crosswinds
episodes.synopsis: Mourning the loss of an ally, Ben forms a new alliance to help identify a shadowy figure who may be responsible for the missing passengers.

name: Better Call Saul
synopsis: This Emmy-nominated prequel to "Breaking Bad" follows small-time attorney Jimmy McGill as he transforms into morally challenged lawyer Saul Goodman.

episodes.title: Uno
episodes.synopsis: Struggling lawyer Jimmy McGill tries to leave his seedy past behind him, but old habits die hard when a big opportunity presents itself.

episodes.title: Mijo
episodes.synopsis: In a tense and violent standoff with dangerous criminals, Jimmy will live or die based on his own powers of persuasion.

episodes.title: Nacho
episodes.synopsis: With the cops holding his dangerous new client, Jimmy tries to point the police in another direction while saving his own skin in the process.

episodes.title: Hero
episodes.synopsis: A desperate Jimmy gets creative in order to drum up new business and manages to sneak in a little revenge for good measure.

episodes.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy
episodes.synopsis: Jimmy tests the waters in a new area of law practice while doing his best to keep his brother out of harm's way.

episodes.title: Five-O
episodes.synopsis: When Mike needs a favor, he finds Jimmy willing to go to surprising lengths to lend a hand. However, that doesn't put Mike's demons to rest.

episodes.title: Bingo
episodes.synopsis: Jimmy's new clients put him at a personal and professional crossroads, so he calls in a favor for some covert assistance.

episodes.title: Rico
episodes.synopsis: The opportunity to serve a crooked company some legal justice sends Jimmy digging for evidence and reinvigorates Chuck in the process.

episodes.title: Pimento
episodes.synopsis: Jimmy's big case forces him to swallow his pride and look for help from an unlikely source. Meanwhile, Mike gets back in the job market.

episodes.title: Marco
episodes.synopsis: While visiting his hometown, Jimmy reunites with his old partner in crime. It doesn't take long before the two start hitting their stride again.

name: Blindspot
synopsis: FBI Agent Kurt Weller is assigned to the case of an amnesiac named Jane Doe whose body is covered with cryptic tattoos -- one of which is Kurt's name.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.synopsis: FBI Agent Kurt Weller is assigned to the case of an amnesiac named Jane Doe whose body is covered with cryptic tattoos -- one of which is Kurt's name.

episodes.title: A Stray Howl
episodes.synopsis: One of Jane's tattoos leads Kurt and the team to a drone pilot with a vengeful plan. A scar on Jane's body reminds Kurt of a childhood tragedy.

episodes.title: Eight Slim Grins
episodes.synopsis: A man from Jane's past is killed while visiting her. A jewel thief shares the same Navy SEAL tattoo as Jane. A DNA test yields a surprising result.

episodes.title: Bone May Rot
episodes.synopsis: A tattoo leads the team to a pair of CDC scientists plotting to unleash a deadly virus. A tooth test contradicts Jane's DNA results.

episodes.title: Split the Law
episodes.synopsis: The team clashes with Carter and the CIA over the occupant of a black site. Jane meets Kurt's family, but Kurt refuses to reconcile with his father.

episodes.title: Cede Your Soul
episodes.synopsis: Jane dreams of a mysterious lover who may or may not be Kurt. The FBI goes after a hacker's app that can make government vehicles trackable.

episodes.title: Sent on Tour
episodes.synopsis: A tattoo leads the team to a town of secessionists and Saúl Guerrero, a fugitive whose arrest causes Mayfair to reveal a top-secret operation to Kurt.

episodes.title: Persecute Envoys
episodes.synopsis: Mayfair and Kurt's relationship is strained when she reveals secrets about her past operations. The team tries to prevent the murder of cops.

episodes.title: Authentic Flirt
episodes.synopsis: Posing as a pair of assassins, Jane and Kurt go to a remote island, where they hope to intercept a kill list of witness names that has been hacked.

episodes.title: Evil Handmade Instrument
episodes.synopsis: The team takes down a Russian sleeper cell. When Carter kidnaps and waterboards Jane, the torture forces her to recover a partial past memory.

name: Narcos
synopsis: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogotá.

episodes.title: Descenso
episodes.synopsis: Chilean drug chemist Cockroach brings his product to Colombian smuggler Pablo Escobar. DEA agent Steve Murphy joins the war on drugs in Bogotá.

episodes.title: The Sword of Simón Bolívar
episodes.synopsis: Communist radical group M-19 makes a move against the narcos, while Murphy gets an education in Colombian law enforcement from his new partner Peña.

episodes.title: The Men of Always
episodes.synopsis: Murphy encounters the depths of government corruption when he and Peña try to derail Escobar's political ambitions by proving he's a narco.

episodes.title: The Palace in Flames
episodes.synopsis: Despite a new extradition treaty, the U.S. puts more money into fighting communism, creating new challenges for Murphy and Peña in the hunt for Pablo.

episodes.title: There Will Be a Future
episodes.synopsis: Pablo's extreme methods put the narcos on the brink of war with Carrillo and the government. Peña tries to protect his witness, Elisa.

episodes.title: Explosivos
episodes.synopsis: Peña and Carrillo close in on Gacha, while Murphy tries to protect pro-extradition candidate Gaviria from a notorious assassin connected to Pablo.

episodes.title: You Will Cry Tears of Blood
episodes.synopsis: Pablo goes into hiding as the political tide turns against him, but he finds a way to strike back. Murphy and Peña finally get the CIA to help them.

episodes.title: La Gran Mentira
episodes.synopsis: A tragic mistake forces the government to change tactics in the fight against Pablo. But Pablo faces bigger threats from inside his empire.

episodes.title: La Catedral
episodes.synopsis: The hunt for Pablo seems to be over after he makes a deal with the government, but Murphy and Peña -- and the Cali Cartel -- have other plans.

episodes.title: Despegue
episodes.synopsis: Pablo's activities in prison provoke the government into taking extreme action. Murphy and Peña face a situation of their own.

name: Orange is The New Black
synopsis: Sentenced to 15 months for a crime committed in her youth, Piper Chapman leaves her supportive fiancé Larry for her new home: a women's prison.

episodes.title: I Wasn't Ready
episodes.synopsis: Sentenced to 15 months for a crime committed in her youth, Piper Chapman leaves her supportive fiancé Larry for her new home: a women's prison.

episodes.title: Tit Punch
episodes.synopsis: After insulting the food in front of the prison chef, Piper is starved out by the kitchen staff and struggles to offer up an acceptable apology.

episodes.title: Lesbian Request Denied
episodes.synopsis: Targeted for romance by a fellow prisoner, Piper finds that subtlety is an ineffective approach to letting her suitor down.

episodes.title: Imaginary Enemies
episodes.synopsis: Piper gets to know her stern new roommate; the prisoners prepare a farewell party for one of their own; a misplaced screwdriver has dire consequences.

episodes.title: The Chickening
episodes.synopsis: When her sighting of a legendary feral chicken polarizes the inmates, Larry wonders if Piper is getting too absorbed in the "fishbowl" of prison life.

episodes.title: WAC Pack
episodes.synopsis: The inmates campaign along racial lines for positions on a prisoners council, but Piper tries to stay above the increasingly raucous competition.

episodes.title: Blood Donut
episodes.synopsis: Piper wants the prison's outdoor running track reopened, but in order to get it, she'll have to give her corrections officer something he wants.

episodes.title: Moscow Mule
episodes.synopsis: Red gets pressured to smuggle drugs through her kitchen; Larry publishes an article about Piper in the New York Times; two babies come into the world.

episodes.title: F*cksgiving
episodes.synopsis: Thanksgiving arrives with the promise of a visit by Larry, but Piper's raunchy dance moves land her in solitary with a holiday feast of moldy bologna.

episodes.title: Bora Bora Bora
episodes.synopsis: Pennsatucky discovers a new skill; the inmates try to scare delinquent teenagers straight; Pornstache's side business suffers a tragic setback.

name: Suits
synopsis: When Harvey's promotion requires him to recruit and hire a graduate of Harvard Law, he chooses Mike Ross. But Mike doesn't actually have a law degree.

episodes.title: Pilot Part 1 & 2
episodes.synopsis: When Harvey's promotion requires him to recruit and hire a graduate of Harvard Law, he chooses Mike Ross. But Mike doesn't actually have a law degree.

episodes.title: Errors and Omissions
episodes.synopsis: An open-and-shut case becomes anything but when Harvey is accused of an inappropriate dalliance with a married woman.

episodes.title: Inside Track
episodes.synopsis: Jessica hopes Harvey's promotion will rein him in, but when a crisis arises, Harvey goes rogue trying to fix it.

episodes.title: Dirty Little Secrets
episodes.synopsis: Harvey and Jessica's relationship is tested when Harvey defends someone from her past.

episodes.title: Bail Out
episodes.synopsis: Mike's life becomes complicated when an old friend reappears and needs his help.

episodes.title: Tricks of the Trade
episodes.synopsis: Harvey and Mike work to save a woman wrongly accused of insider trading.

episodes.title: Play the Man
episodes.synopsis: It's mock trial time at Pearson Hardman as Mike faces off against Louis's protégé, Kyle.

episodes.title: Identity Crisis
episodes.synopsis: Mike is tasked with reining in a modern-day Robin Hood whose illicit deeds are putting a client's business at risk.

episodes.title: Undefeated
episodes.synopsis: An undefeated lawyer's shady tactics keep him one step ahead of Harvey, who must decide if he's willing to compromise his ethics to win the case.

episodes.title: The Shelf Life
episodes.synopsis: Harvey must keep Mike out of Jessica's line of fire when his empathy for a fired executive begins to jeopardize the firm's relationship with a client.

name: 13 Reasons Why
synopsis: As the school mourns the death of Hannah Baker, her friend Clay receives a box of tapes with messages she recorded before she died by suicide.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side A
episodes.synopsis: As the school mourns the death of Hannah Baker, her friend Clay receives a box of tapes with messages she recorded before she died by suicide.

episodes.title: Tape 1, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah makes friends with Jessica and Alex, two other new students. Justin doesn't show up at school, and Hannah's mother finds something troubling.

episodes.title: Tape 2, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Jealousy and gossip take a toll on Hannah's relationships. As Alex struggles with feelings of regret, the guys pressure Clay into getting drunk.

episodes.title: Tape 2, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah thinks someone is stalking her and sets a trap. Hannah's mother confronts the principal, and Clay strikes back at someone who wronged Hannah.

episodes.title: Tape 3, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Hannah and Clay connect at the school dance, but a crass rumor ruins the mood. Clay takes Courtney to visit Hannah's grave.

episodes.title: Tape 3, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Hannah's date on Valentine's Day doesn't go as planned. Alex gets in a big fight at school and has to face the honor board.

episodes.title: Tape 4, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Another student sabotages Hannah during a class project. Clay's nightmares about Hannah spill over into the daytime.

episodes.title: Tape 4, Side B
episodes.synopsis: Inspired by a friend’s poetry reading, Hannah pours her heart out. Tony confides in Clay about the night of Hannah's death.

episodes.title: Tape 5, Side A
episodes.synopsis: Hannah witnesses a traumatic event at a summertime party. Clay tries to reason with Justin, and Marcus warns him that the worst is yet to come.

episodes.title: Tape 5, Side B
episodes.synopsis: A distraught Hannah gets a ride home from the party. Jessica's behavior grows increasingly erratic, and Clay learns the truth behind a tragedy.

name: Young Sheldon
synopsis: Brilliant yet awkward nine-year-old Sheldon Cooper lands in high school where his smarts leave everyone stumped in this "The Big Bang Theory" spinoff.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.synopsis: Nine-year-old Sheldon starts high school, where his brilliant mind is met with strong reactions.

episodes.title: Rockets, Communists, and the Dewey Decimal System
episodes.synopsis: To appease his worried mother, Sheldon employs techniques from a self-help book to try and make a friend.

episodes.title: Poker, Faith, and Eggs
episodes.synopsis: When George Sr. is rushed to the emergency room, Meemaw comes to babysit and the kids have an adventure getting to the hospital on their own.

episodes.title: A Therapist, a Comic Book, and a Breakfast Sausage
episodes.synopsis: After choking on a breakfast sausage, Sheldon wrestles with his fear of solid foods and discovers comic books for the first time.

episodes.title: A Solar Calculator, a Game Ball, and a Cheerleader's Bosom
episodes.synopsis: Sheldon struggles with newfound popularity after utilizing statistics to help the football team.

episodes.title: A Patch, a Modem, and a Zantac®
episodes.synopsis: When a NASA representative visits Sheldon's school and dismisses his scientific suggestion, Sheldon sets out on a mission to prove him wrong.

episodes.title: A Brisket, Voodoo, and Cannonball Run
episodes.synopsis: The kids brainstorm ways to resolve a family feud when Meemaw refuses to give George Sr. her brisket recipe.

episodes.title: Cape Canaveral, Schrödinger's Cat, and Cyndi Lauper's Hair
episodes.synopsis: To bond with Sheldon, George Sr. takes the boys on a trip to see the space shuttle launch. Mary, Missy and Meemaw have a girls' weekend at the salon.

episodes.title: Spock, Kirk, and Testicular Hernia
episodes.synopsis: George Sr. strikes a deal with Sheldon to tutor Georgie when poor grades threaten Georgie's future on the football team.

episodes.title: An Eagle Feather, a String Bean, and an Eskimo
episodes.synopsis: When Sheldon interviews at a school in Dallas for gifted children, his family struggles to cope with his absence.

name: Dark
synopsis: Armed with a plan to prevent the apocalypse, Jonas travels to 2019. During the Nielsens' anniversary party, Ulrich sneaks off with Hannah.

episodes.title: Beginnings and Endings
episodes.synopsis: Six months after the disappearances, the police form a task force. In 2052, Jonas learns that most of Winden perished in an apocalyptic event.

episodes.title: Dark Matter
episodes.synopsis: Clausen and Charlotte interview Regina. The Stranger takes Hannah to 1987, where Claudia has an unnerving encounter and Egon visits an old nemesis.

episodes.title: Ghosts
episodes.synopsis: In 1954, a missing Helge returns, but he'll only speak to Noah. In 1987, Claudia brings the time machine to Tannhaus, and Egon questions Ulrich again.

episodes.title: The Travelers
episodes.synopsis: Jonas meets an ominous figure. While the kids comb the cave for answers, the adults gather in the bunker to share what they know about the travelers.

episodes.title: Lost and Found
episodes.synopsis: In 1987, Ulrich seizes an opportunity. The kids return to the cave with the time machine, and Jonas learns of a loophole that could change the future.

episodes.title: An Endless Cycle
episodes.synopsis: Armed with a plan to prevent the apocalypse, Jonas travels to 2019. During the Nielsens' anniversary party, Ulrich sneaks off with Hannah.

episodes.title: The White Devil
episodes.synopsis: Martha meets the Stranger and learns his true identity. Claudia tries to prevent Egon's death in 1987. Hannah travels to 1954 to see Ulrich.

episodes.title: Endings and Beginnings
episodes.synopsis: On the day of the apocalypse, Clausen executes a search warrant at the power plant as Jonas and Claudia use the time machine to connect past and future.

name: Elite
synopsis: After a public high school collapses, the builder tries to repair its image by paying for three impacted students to attend an exclusive private school.

episodes.title: Welcome
episodes.synopsis: After a public high school collapses, the builder tries to repair its image by paying for three impacted students to attend an exclusive private school.

episodes.title: Desire
episodes.synopsis: A school project brings Marina and Samuel closer, and inspires Guzmán to try and win over Nadia. Meanwhile, Christian is shocked by a revelation.

episodes.title: Saturday Night
episodes.synopsis: Samuel throws a party, where Nano makes a move on Marina and spiked punch affects more than one couple. Nadia is hurt by what she learns about Guzmán.

episodes.title: Love is a Drug
episodes.synopsis: Guzmán tries to earn Nadia's forgiveness. Polo and Christian bond at a gala. Lu bribes her teacher. To pay his debt, Nano must complete a dark mission.

episodes.title: Everyone Lies
episodes.synopsis: Marina gives Nano a way to pay his debt. Lu intentionally leaks a secret in front of Nadia. Omar learns Ander told his friends about the two of them.

episodes.title: Everything Will Be Okay
episodes.synopsis: Nano learns one watch holds a secret. Marina's pot stash is found. News of a pregnancy raises suspicions. Christian is offered fame if he does a favor.

episodes.title: Everything Explodes
episodes.synopsis: Carla suspects Marina is involved in the theft. Omar's father makes plans for his son. After learning his sister’s secret, Guzmán seeks revenge.

episodes.title: Assilah
episodes.synopsis: The last moments before the murder unfold. Christian makes a tough decision. The police arrest a suspect. Guzmán becomes reckless with grief.

name: Sintonia
synopsis: Doni nurtures hopes that his musical career will take off, Nando tries to get promoted in a drug dealing operation, and Rita worries about her friend.

episodes.title: They Caught Cacau
episodes.synopsis: Doni nurtures hopes that his musical career will take off, Nando tries to get promoted in a drug dealing operation, and Rita worries about her friend.

episodes.title: I Did a Bad Thing
episodes.synopsis: A wounded Rita feels guilty about Cacau. Nando gets in trouble with law enforcement and Doni confronts Dondoka about stealing his music.

episodes.title: Second Chance
episodes.synopsis: Doni starts to enjoy his success but his friends urge him to stay grounded. Nando defends a threatened Juninho and Rita sees another side of religion.

episodes.title: Do the Right Thing
episodes.synopsis: Doni overcommits himself to too many performances, while Rita plans a fundraiser. Nando fears for his life after a drug delivery seemingly goes awry.

episodes.title: Make Your Mark
episodes.synopsis: Badá decides what to do with Nando. Rita has a meaningful religious experience and considers her future. Doni performs to an energized crowd.

episodes.title: Moving to the Same Beat
episodes.synopsis: A grieving Doni takes a risk during his first television appearance. Rita prepares for her baptism. Nando is rewarded within the drug cartel.

name: You
synopsis: Now living in London, Joe tries to lay low and resist old habits... until he's forced to tie up loose ends and bond with a circle of wealthy socialites.

episodes.title: Joe Takes a Holiday
episodes.synopsis: Now living in London, Joe tries to lay low and resist old habits... until he's forced to tie up loose ends and bond with a circle of wealthy socialites.

episodes.title: Portrait of the Artist
episodes.synopsis: Joe leans on his skills — and a student's insights — to catch his stalker. An art show offers a gallery of suspects, revealing more than the eye can see.

episodes.title: Eat the Rich
episodes.synopsis: As news of a killer targeting the rich swirls, Joe's stalker inches dangerously close to the truth. Joe's efforts to protect Kate take a dark turn.

episodes.title: Hampsie
episodes.synopsis: A ritzy weekend getaway doubles as a chance for Joe to hunt down his elusive stalker. Without cell service or Wi-Fi, Joe makes a key connection.

episodes.title: The Fox and the Hound
episodes.synopsis: While falling back into familiar patterns, Joe gets caught up in an unfortunate game as everyone's plans go up in flames.

episodes.title: Best of Friends
episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of the murders, Joe searches for a scapegoat and Rhys pursues his grand ambitions while Kate and Phoebe assert their independence.

episodes.title: Good Man, Cruel World
episodes.synopsis: The tables turn for Joe when an influential figure comes to town with a tempting offer as Nadia follows a hunch.

episodes.title: Where Are You Going, Where Have You Been?
episodes.synopsis: As memories of the past trickle in, Joe struggles to recall an important detail. Phoebe shares her hasty plans with Kate. Nadia scrambles for a solution.

episodes.title: She's Not There
episodes.synopsis: Torn between his dark side and good intentions, Joe works to right his wrongs. After attempting to help Phoebe, Kate faces her father — and hard truths.

episodes.title: The Death of Jonathan Moore
episodes.synopsis: With love and loss weighing heavily on his mind, Joe commits a final act in hopes of never walking down the same path again.

name: Mind Hunter
synopsis: In 1977, frustrated FBI hostage negotiator Holden Ford finds an unlikely ally in veteran agent Bill Tench and begins studying a new class of murderer.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.synopsis: In 1977, frustrated FBI hostage negotiator Holden Ford finds an unlikely ally in veteran agent Bill Tench and begins studying a new class of murderer.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.synopsis: Holden interviews the eerily articulate murderer Ed Kemper, but his research provokes negative feedback at the Bureau.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.synopsis: Dr. Wendy Carr joins Holden and Tench in their first success, when their insights lead to an arrest.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.synopsis: Bill and Holden consult with Dr. Wendy Carr to begin classifying their subjects. They receive surprising news.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.synopsis: Holden and Bill return to a perplexing case in Pennsylvania where a set of clues leading in multiple directions leaves no shortage of suspects.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.synopsis: Wendy considers an offer. Holden and Bill struggle to communicate the meaning of their findings to the judicial system in the baffling Altoona case.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.synopsis: Wendy takes a career risk to relocate and join the team full time. Holden and Bill find it harder to keep the emotional intensity of work at bay.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.synopsis: Bill and Wendy interview candidates for a fourth member of the team. Holden is intrigued by complaints about a school principal's odd habit.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.synopsis: Holden's methods during a disturbing interview with mass murderer Richard Speck create dissension among the team and kick off an internal FBI probe.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.synopsis: The team cracks under pressure from an in-house review. Holden's bold style elicits a confession but puts his career, relationships and health at risk.

name: Stranger Things
synopsis: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces and one strange little girl.

episodes.title: Chapter One: The Vanishing of Will Byers
episodes.synopsis: On his way home from a friend's house, young Will sees something terrifying. Nearby, a sinister secret lurks in the depths of a government lab.

episodes.title: Chapter Two: The Weirdo on Maple Street
episodes.synopsis: Lucas, Mike and Dustin try to talk to the girl they found in the woods. Hopper questions an anxious Joyce about an unsettling phone call.

episodes.title: Chapter Three: Holly, Jolly
episodes.synopsis: An increasingly concerned Nancy looks for Barb and finds out what Jonathan's been up to. Joyce is convinced Will is trying to talk to her.

episodes.title: Chapter Four: The Body
episodes.synopsis: Refusing to believe Will is dead, Joyce tries to connect with her son. The boys give Eleven a makeover. Nancy and Jonathan form an unlikely alliance.

episodes.title: Chapter Five: The Flea and the Acrobat
episodes.synopsis: Hopper breaks into the lab while Nancy and Jonathan confront the force that took Will. The boys ask Mr. Clarke how to travel to another dimension.

episodes.title: Chapter Six: The Monster
episodes.synopsis: A frantic Jonathan looks for Nancy in the darkness, but Steve's looking for her, too. Hopper and Joyce uncover the truth about the lab's experiments.

episodes.title: Chapter Seven: The Bathtub
episodes.synopsis: Eleven struggles to reach Will, while Lucas warns that "the bad men are coming." Nancy and Jonathan show the police what Jonathan caught on camera.

episodes.title: Chapter Eight: The Upside Down
episodes.synopsis: Dr. Brenner holds Hopper and Joyce for questioning while the boys wait with Eleven in the gym. Back at Will's, Nancy and Jonathan prepare for battle.

name: Berlin
synopsis: During his glory days, Berlin and a gang assembled in Paris for one of his greatest plans ever: stealing 44 million euros' worth of jewels in one night.

episodes.title: The Energy of Love
episodes.synopsis: During his glory days, Berlin assembles a gang in Paris for an almost impossible heist for 44 million euros' worth of jewels from 34 cities in one night.

episodes.title: Anchor and Lobo
episodes.synopsis: Roi and Cameron must stop Father Toureaux as he threatens to bungle the plan. Meanwhile, love is in the air on Paris's streets — and in the Catacombs.

episodes.title: Full House of Embryos
episodes.synopsis: Everything seems to be rolling along — for a short while. While Berlin schemes to get his way with both the heist and Camille, Damián gets some bad news.

episodes.title: An Aquarium on Your Back
episodes.synopsis: The robbery is on and tensions are high as the crew starts to doubt Berlin's leadership. Keila and Bruce must make sure to cover their tracks.

episodes.title: After Love
episodes.synopsis: Cameron's resurfaced trauma bursts in at an illegal street race. The plan enters a new phase as the gang flees the police, who are hot on their heels.

episodes.title: Night of the Lemons
episodes.synopsis: Camille's suspicions heighten. Damián, Cameron and Roi have a troubling encounter, shaking the entire gang's alibis. A loose end emerges in Paris.

episodes.title: The Last Virgin in the Western World
episodes.synopsis: As Bruce helps Keila with a life-or-death situation, Sierra and Murillo join the French police to look into the theft. Berlin suffers an ultimate defeat.

episodes.title: An Endangered Elephant
episodes.synopsis: Backed into a corner, the gang maneuvers a final escape plan. Only time will tell if Berlin is ready for the ultimate bombshell.

name: Boss Baby
synopsis: A kid finds himself at the center of a sinister corporate plot when his parents bring home a baby who only talks business when they're not around.

name: Captains of the World
synopsis: From the locker room to the pitch, this docuseries offers exclusive access to all 32 teams as they fight for football glory in the 2022 FIFA World Cup.

episodes.title: Great Expectations
episodes.synopsis: Messi remembers Maradona, Thiago Silva recalls his battle with tuberculosis and Tyler Adams tries to change the world's view of football in America.

episodes.title: Where Is Messi?
episodes.synopsis: Simon Kjær discusses Kylian Mbappé’s star power and the politics of playing in Qatar. Kalidou Koulibaly reflects on African solidarity at the Cup.

episodes.title: Against All Odds
episodes.synopsis: The Round of 16 looms large. Australia aims to take out a god; Maya Yoshida tries to rewrite Japan’s legacy in the knockout stage; Morocco makes history.

episodes.title: The Harder They Fall
episodes.synopsis: Friction finds Ronaldo benched. Silva braces for backlash when Croatia eliminates Brazil. Morocco captain Romain Saïss discusses the energy in Qatar.

episodes.title: Mind Games
episodes.synopsis: Club friends turn to foes as France faces England. Argentina reopens old wounds for the Netherlands. Later, Luka Modrić's Cup career comes to a close.

episodes.title: The Greatest
episodes.synopsis: With half of the world's population watching and his legacy on the line, Messi takes on Mbappé and France in a final, epic clash of football titans.

name: Chicken Run
synopsis: A determined hen and a cocky rooster lead their feathered friends in a great escape from the farm to make sure they're not turned into chicken pies.

name: Criminal Code
synopsis: Benício teams up with Suellen for their first case together. Meanwhile, Rossi greenlights unorthodox methods to solve crimes in his police station.

episodes.title: Free for All
episodes.synopsis: Benício teams up with Suellen for their first case together. Meanwhile, Rossi greenlights unorthodox methods to solve crimes in his police station.

episodes.title: Traces of the Night
episodes.synopsis: A new agent joins the team, and Benício explains the dynamics of organized crime. Soulless reunites with his former colleagues.

episodes.title: Animal Man
episodes.synopsis: After discovering two new DNA samples, Suellen and Benício follow Roleta. But they're not the only ones tracking the suspect down.

episodes.title: Convoy
episodes.synopsis: While Suellen recovers, Benício leads the investigation and hears word of a major upcoming heist. This requires Soulless to change tack.

episodes.title: Everything for the Family
episodes.synopsis: Benício and Suellen collect additional DNA samples from other suspects. Yuri and Rossi discuss the Ghost Gang, and Moreira is reassigned.

episodes.title: At Home
episodes.synopsis: Yuri relocates to Brasilia. Suellen and Benício uncover Soulless' real name and his past. A maneuver by the Ghost Gang turns deadly.

episodes.title: Hacienda
episodes.synopsis: Isaac and Soulless argue. Benício and Suellen deal with pressing family matters. A traitor causes trouble for Rossi and his department.

episodes.title: The End and The Beginning
episodes.synopsis: While Guilherme succumbs to pressure and Maria Clara gets revenge, Benício and Soulless have a dramatic showdown.

name: Fool Me Once
synopsis: When ex-soldier Maya sees her murdered husband on a secret nanny cam, she uncovers a deadly conspiracy that stretches deep into the past.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.synopsis: Maya attends the funeral of her murdered husband Joe at his family’s stately home — then thinks she sees him, days later, on a hidden nanny cam.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.synopsis: News about the murder weapon sets the investigation on a new course. Maya goes searching for answers and learns something surprising about her sister.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.synopsis: Maya chases the car that's been following her. With the adults distracted, Claire's children investigate the mystery of their mother's old photo.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.synopsis: The detectives question the owner of the motorbike from the crime scene. Kierce's condition catches up with him at a critical moment.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.synopsis: Maya sees an unexpected face when she takes Lily to see her grandmother. Kierce struggles to come to terms with his test results.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.synopsis: Suspicion falls on Maya when she's found at a crime scene — but she's the one who makes an accusation. McGreggor discovers something new about Kierce.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.synopsis: As the police close in on a suspect, Maya decides to take drastic action. Shane begs her for answers — and learns the truth about their shared past.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.synopsis: With the last pieces of the puzzle starting to fall into place, Maya confronts her husband's family one last time, and Kierce seeks help from Corey.

name: Hankcock
synopsis: Will Smith stars as Hancock, a down-and-out superhero who's forced to employ a public relations expert to help repair his image.

name: How To Get Away With Murder
synopsis: Brilliant criminal defense attorney and law professor Annalise Keating, plus five of her students, become involved in a twisted murder case.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.synopsis: A tough criminal law professor challenges her brightest students to solve thorny cases, but five scholars soon learn the high price of impressing her.

episodes.title: It's All Her Fault
episodes.synopsis: Annalise challenges her students to prove the innocence of an eccentric millionaire suspected of his wife's murder; Wes may be harboring secrets.

episodes.title: Smile, or Go to Jail
episodes.synopsis: A soccer mom arrested for a petty crime turns out to be a terrorist; Annalise represents a college football star linked to Lila's disappearance.

episodes.title: Let's Get to Scooping
episodes.synopsis: Annalise and her students dig up a shocking truth when the head of a brokerage firm is arrested for insider trading; Wes discovers an unsettling clue.

episodes.title: We're Not Friends
episodes.synopsis: Annalise represents a minor who shot his police officer father; Annalise and Sam argue over Lila; Wes and Rebecca question Annalise's motives.

episodes.title: Freakin' Whack-a-Mole
episodes.synopsis: A case gets personal for Annalise and the team when their client is a man sentenced to death by Asher's father; Frank tries to find Rebecca.

episodes.title: He Deserved to Die
episodes.synopsis: When the judge enforces a gag order in Rebecca's case, she takes matters into her own hands; Michaela is surprised by a prenuptial agreement.

episodes.title: He Has a Wife
episodes.synopsis: The team represents a woman on trial for killing her nanny; a shocking discovery in Lila's case tests loyalties; more is revealed about Sam and Lila.

episodes.title: Kill Me, Kill Me, Kill Me
episodes.synopsis: On the evening of the bonfire, future flashes finally sync with the present, and the exact circumstances of Sam's death are finally revealed.

episodes.title: Hello Raskolnikov
episodes.synopsis: As the team helps Annalise search for Sam, it is unclear how much Annalise really knows; a surprise visitor makes things harder on the students.

name: Lucifer
synopsis: Bored with being the Lord of Hell, the devil relocates to Los Angeles, where he opens a nightclub and forms a connection with a homicide detective.

episodes.title: Pilot
episodes.synopsis: After an old acquaintance meets a violent fate, the charming Lucifer vows revenge on the perpetrators and makes an unexpected alliance.

episodes.title: Lucifer, Stay. Good Devil.
episodes.synopsis: While feeling the heat to return to hell, Lucifer makes time to investigate how overeager paparazzi contributed to a young man's death.

episodes.title: The Would-Be Prince of Darkness
episodes.synopsis: A pro quarterback on the brink of superstardom wakes to a grisly discovery and calls on Lucifer to help prove his innocence.

episodes.title: Manly Whatnots
episodes.synopsis: Lucifer attempts to seduce Chloe, but she's just not like the other ladies. Meanwhile, Amenadiel shares his concern with Maze about Lucifer.

episodes.title: Sweet Kicks
episodes.synopsis: Lucifer's treated to an inside look at the ugly side of fashion. Armed with new information, Amenadiel hatches a plan to get Lucifer back home.

episodes.title: Favorite Son
episodes.synopsis: When a personal possession is stolen, Lucifer sets out to track the culprit. Meanwhile, Dr. Linda makes a fateful decision.

episodes.title: Wingman
episodes.synopsis: Lucifer goes in search of his missing property and gets help from an unlikely source. Chloe asks Dan for help with the Palmetto case.

episodes.title: Et Tu, Doctor?
episodes.synopsis: Lucifer celebrates his "rebirthday," then teams with Chloe and Dr. Linda to investigate the murder of a controversial therapist.

episodes.title: A Priest Walks into a Bar
episodes.synopsis: Suspicious that drugs are coming through a youth center, a priest asks Lucifer for a little help. Amenadiel and Malcolm have a heart-to-heart.

episodes.title: Pops
episodes.synopsis: When a popular chef is poisoned, Chloe and Lucifer home in on a suspect. Lucifer learns that Chloe's family may be even crazier than his own.

name: Lupin
synopsis: Inspired by the adventures of Arsène Lupin, gentleman thief Assane Diop sets out to avenge his father for an injustice inflicted by a wealthy family.

episodes.title: Chapter 1
episodes.synopsis: Years after a tragic injustice, Assane seeks to settle a score — and a debt — by stealing a diamond necklace, but the heist takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Chapter 2
episodes.synopsis: Assane hatches a plot to contact Comet, an inmate who steers him to a clue about Babakar's demise. Anne Pellegrini comes clean about the past.

episodes.title: Chapter 3
episodes.synopsis: Assane confronts Commissioner Dumont and plants a decoy to divert the police. Hubert Pellegrini's connection to Babakar's fate comes to light.

episodes.title: Chapter 4
episodes.synopsis: To retrieve incriminating evidence on Hubert, Assane enlists the help of a journalist. Officer Guédira connects the dots around the Louvre heist.

episodes.title: Chapter 5
episodes.synopsis: En route to Étretat with Claire and Raoul, Assane encounters an unwelcome figure. In a bind, Assane sends a message to Capt. Laugier.

name: Sex Education
synopsis: Despite the ministrations of sex therapist mom Jean and encouragement from pal Eric, Otis worries that he can't get it on. He's not the only one.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.synopsis: Despite the ministrations of sex therapist mom Jean and encouragement from pal Eric, Otis worries that he can't get it on. He's not the only one.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.synopsis: Egged on by Maeve -- and finding that dispensing sex tips is tougher than he thought -- Otis tries offering free advice at a classmate's house party.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.synopsis: Otis' clinic achieves liftoff, as does his attraction to Maeve, who unexpectedly asks him for help. Eric swings off on his own and fields a come-on.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.synopsis: Eric realizes Otis has fallen for Maeve. But the young sex therapist finds himself torn when hot guy Jackson seeks help with his secret crush.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.synopsis: An explicit pic puts a mean girl on the spot. Maeve wants to track down the shaming culprit, forcing Otis to make a tough choice on an important day.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.synopsis: Eric's trauma isolates him, and Maeve's essay wins a prize. Otis tries to hook up with Lily, but his deep-seated issues get in the way.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.synopsis: The big dance brings out the best, and the drama, in Moordale's student body. Otis finds a date, Maeve gets her dress, and Eric returns with style.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.synopsis: Otis feels violated by Jean's new book, and Maeve takes the fall for her brother. Eric serves detention with an old foe, while Lily's body betrays her.

name: The Chosen
synopsis: With his teachings and miracles, Jesus of Nazareth attracts students and followers from all walks of life. But the Roman authorities grow uneasy.

episodes.title: I Have Called You By Name
episodes.synopsis: In Capernaum, on the Sea of Galilee, the Romans ask Nicodemus to perform an exorcism on Lilith, but he is appalled at what he witnesses.

episodes.title: Shabbat
episodes.synopsis: After Jesus frees Lilith from her demons, she reveals her true identity as Mary Magdalene. Meanwhile, Simon prepares to betray his friends for money.

episodes.title: Jesus Loves the Little Children
episodes.synopsis: Young Abigail, Joshua and their friends meet Jesus in the woods and start listening to his teachings.

episodes.title: The Rock On Which It Is Built
episodes.synopsis: Afraid of being double-crossed, Quintus enlists Matthew to spy on the fisherman, who gives up hope until he witnesses a miracle.

episodes.title: The Wedding Gift
episodes.synopsis: Jesus and his followers travel to Cana for a wedding, where soon the hosts run out of wine. Only a miracle can save the day.

episodes.title: Indescribable Compassion
episodes.synopsis: After Jesus asks Simon to return to Caparneum and attend to his family, the Messiah heals a leper. Word of his miracles begins to spread.

episodes.title: Invitations
episodes.synopsis: Quintus feels threatened by the new preacher, Jesus, and asks Nicodemus to meet with him and report back.

episodes.title: I Am He
episodes.synopsis: While Matthew hosts a dinner with Jesus and the other disciples at his home, Nicodemus is torn as to which path to take.

name: The Manny
synopsis: A busy executive hires a cowboy to care for her kids in a moment of panic. Little does she know he'll challenge her views of gender roles — and of love.

episodes.title: Yes, You Can Change The World
episodes.synopsis: In a single day, Gabriel leaves a lasting impression on Jimena’s kids — and they, in turn, leave a lasting impression on a group of executives.

episodes.title: The Tooth Fairy
episodes.synopsis: The race for the company's presidency is on. As Gabriel continues to pull tricks up his sleeve, Jimena works up the courage to stand up for herself.

episodes.title: The Value of a Like
episodes.synopsis: An accidental swipe leads to a surprising twist in Jimena's evening, bringing about a serendipitous encounter with the right person.

episodes.title: Cockfight
episodes.synopsis: Just as Jimena ponders her next move, someone from her past shakes everything up, adding smiles — and tension — to her household.

episodes.title: Wolves, Sheep, Pigs and Magicians
episodes.synopsis: Jimena and her appointed accomplices set out to hunt information with the help of magic. But too much magic proves dismal for Gabriel's chances.

episodes.title: Stolen Triumphs
episodes.synopsis: A day at the country club becomes an opportunity for the kids to go after their true wishes and opens Jimena’s eyes to what she no longer wants.

episodes.title: Twisted Arm
episodes.synopsis: Ernesto and Sofía concoct a plan to bring a couple together while Jimena plots to bring them apart. Rogelio’s intentions come to light.

episodes.title: What's Meant for You Won't Pass You by
episodes.synopsis: The story around the ranches' payments becomes murkier. The kids ramp up the mischief as they vow to stop what they believe could be a dire outcome.

episodes.title: Wrangled
episodes.synopsis: Gabriel joins Leo on his school trip to the cattle show, where he realizes he risks revealing his identity — and, to Jimena’s dismay, his new romance.

episodes.title: Changing the World
episodes.synopsis: Jimena heads for Tepatitlán to gather more information, but just as things begin to look up, her hopes of getting what she wants are derailed.

name: True Beauty
synopsis: Formerly bullied, a teen masters the art of makeup and becomes a knockout at her new school — but keeping up appearances is harder than it seems.

episodes.title: Episode 1
episodes.synopsis: Relentless bullying by her classmates drives Im Joo-gyeong to make an alarming decision. Due her father's mishap, she transfers to a new school.

episodes.title: Episode 2
episodes.synopsis: After running into Lee Su-ho at the comic book store, Joo-gyeong fears her secret will be exposed. She later recognizes a familiar face at her school.

episodes.title: Episode 3
episodes.synopsis: Afraid of having her identity revealed, Joo-gyeong bargains with Su-ho for secrecy. Han Seo-jun demands his helmet back from Joo-gyeong.

episodes.title: Episode 4
episodes.synopsis: In the midst of a love triangle rumor at school, Joo-gyeong agrees to a blind date. Seo-jun and Joo-gyeong find out that their mothers are friends.

episodes.title: Episode 5
episodes.synopsis: Joo-gyeong decides to use her makeup skills to help out a bullied girl. Later, Joo-gyeong is hurt by Su-ho's sudden cruel behavior.

episodes.title: Episode 6
episodes.synopsis: Su-ho's father arrives at his son's school and causes a frenzy. Joo-gyeong has a tense encounter with her former bullies.

episodes.title: Episode 7
episodes.synopsis: A star baseball player becomes infatuated with Joo-gyeong and begins flirting with her. Joo-gyeong witnesses Su-ho comforting Kang Su-jin.

episodes.title: Episode 8
episodes.synopsis: Su-ho's attempt to clear things up with Joo-gyeong on their school trip doesn't go as planned. Seo-jun continues vying for Joo-gyeong's attention.

episodes.title: Episode 9
episodes.synopsis: Joo-gyeong starts looking for a part-time job. Meanwhile, in order to avoid drama at their school, she and Su-ho begin dating in secret.

episodes.title: Episode 10
episodes.synopsis: Su-jin reveals her true feelings about Su-ho to Joo-gyeong — leaving her conflicted. Joo-gyeong discovers that Seo-jun also works at her new job.
